code: import'../styles/MarqueeBrands.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import bmwLogo from'../assets/bmw.webp';import heroLogo from'../assets/hero.webp';import ktmLogo from'../assets/ktm.webp';import kawasakiLogo from'../assets/kawasaki.webp';import yamahaLogo from'../assets/yamaha.webp';import royalEnfieldLogo from'../assets/royal-enfield.webp';import bajajLogo from'../assets/bajaj.webp';import ducatiLogo from'../assets/ducati.webp';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const brands=[{id:"yamaha",name:"Yamaha",logo:yamahaLogo},{id:"hero",name:"Hero",logo:heroLogo},{id:"ktm",name:"KTM",logo:ktmLogo},{id:"royal-enfield",name:"Royal Enfield",logo:royalEnfieldLogo},{id:"bajaj",name:"Bajaj",logo:bajajLogo},{id:"ducati",name:"Ducati",logo:ducatiLogo},{id:"bmw",name:"BMW",logo:bmwLogo},{id:"kawasaki",name:"Kawasaki",logo:kawasakiLogo}];const MarqueeBrands=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marquee-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"marquee",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marquee-content",children:brands.map((brand,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/brand/${brand.id}`,className:"brand-card",children:brand.logo?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:brand.logo,alt:brand.name,className:"brand-logo"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"brand-placeholder"})},`brand-${idx}`))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marquee-content",children:brands.map((brand,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/brand/${brand.id}`,className:"brand-card",children:brand.logo?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:brand.logo,alt:brand.name,className:"brand-logo"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"brand-placeholder"})},`brand-duplicate-${idx}`))})]})});};export default MarqueeBrands;
